org.dotplot.image
Class Colorbar

java.lang.Object
  Canvas
      org.dotplot.image.Colorbar
public final class Colorbar
extends Canvas

A output widget used to display a colormap, derived from the org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas, and can be used in any context that calls for a Canvas.

See Also:
Serialized Form
